         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMassachusetts+Institute+of+Technology&amp;rft.au=Erik+Sherman&amp;rft.aufirst=Bruce&amp;rft.aulast=Gellerman&amp;rft.btitle=Massachusetts+Curiosities%3A+Quirky+Characters%2C+Roadside+Oddities%2C+%26+Other+Offbeat+Stuff&amp;rft.date=2004&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=0-7627-3070-6&amp;rft.pages=65-66&amp;rft.pub=Globe+Pequot&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">

       <li id="cite_note-BrassRat2013-297">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-BrassRat2013_297-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation news">
          Pourian, Jessica J. (February 15, 2011).
          <a class="external text" href="http://tech.mit.edu/V131/N5/ringpremiere.html" rel="nofollow">
           "2013's Brass Rat unveiled"
          </a>
          .
          <i>
           <a href="/wiki/The_Tech_(newspaper)" title="The Tech (newspaper)">
            The Tech
           </a>
          </i>
          .
          <b>
           131
          </b>
          (5)
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            June 12,
           </span>
           2011
          </span>

         </cite>

       <li id="cite_note-313">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-313">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          Kathryn Krtnick, Asst. Dir. of Communications (November 28, 2012).
          <a class="external text" href="http://mitcrimeclub.org/ncaa121128.pdf" rel="nofollow">
           "Re: NCAA Media Inquiry"
          </a>
          <span style="font-size:85%;">
           (PDF)
          </span>
          . Natl. Collegiate Athletic Assn.
          <q>
           List of institutions that sponsor the most sports: Bowdoin College and Williams College – 32; MIT – 31.
          </q>
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMassachusetts+Institute+of+Technology&amp;rft.au=Kathryn+Krtnick%2C+Asst.+Dir.+of+Communications&amp;rft.btitle=Re%3A+NCAA+Media+Inquiry&amp;rft.date=2012-11-28&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fmitcrimeclub.org%2Fncaa121128.pdf&amp;rft.pub=Natl.+Collegiate+Athletic+Assn&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">

       <li id="cite_note-Athletics-314">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-Athletics_314-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          Dept. of Athletics (Aug 2012).
          <a class="external text" href="http://mit.edu/athletics/www/department/DAPERQuickFacts09.pdf" rel="nofollow">
           "2012–13 Quick Facts"
          </a>
          <span style="font-size:85%;">
           (PDF)
          </span>
          . MIT.
          <q>
           Intercollegiate Athletics: 33 varsity sports.
          </q>

          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <a class="external text" href="http://sciencecareers.sciencemag.org/career_magazine/previous_issues/articles/1999_11_12/nodoi.2404097675680151592" rel="nofollow">

         </a>
         Andrew Lawler; Science Careers; November 12, 1999

           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <span class="languageicon" style="font-size:0.95em; font-weight:bold; color:#555;">
          (Chinese)
         </span>
         <a class="external text" href="http://scitech.people.com.cn/GB/10294899.html" rel="nofollow">
          钱学森：历尽险阻报效祖国 火箭之王淡泊名誉
         </a>
         ，人民网，2009年10月31日.Accessed Oct. 31, 2009;
         <span class="languageicon" style="font-size:0.95em; font-weight:bold; color:#555;">
          (Chinese)
         </span>
         <a class="external text" href="http://news.163.com/09/1031/17/5MVIKNT90001124J.html" rel="nofollow">
          美国航空周刊2008年度人物:钱学森
         </a>
         ．网易探索(广州)（2009年10月31日）. Accessed Nov. 11, 2009.
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-365">

        <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMassachusetts+Institute+of+Technology&amp;rft.aufirst=Robert+Rakes&amp;rft.aulast=Shrock&amp;rft.btitle=Geology+at+MIT+1865%931965%3A+A+History+of+the+First+Hundred+Years+of+Geology+at+Massachusetts+Institute+of+Technology&amp;rft.date=1982&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=9780262192118&amp;rft.place=Cambridge%2C+Mass.&amp;rft.pub=MIT+Press&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">

        </span>
       </li>
